## Introduction

This page examines the relationship between life expectancy and GDP per capita using the Gapminder dataset. We explore how economic development is associated with improvements in life expectancy over time.

## Data and Visualization

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
gapminder <- read.csv("gapminder.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(gapminder, aes(x = gdp_per_capita, 
                      y = life_expectancy,
                      color = continent)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.6) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  labs(
    title = "Life Expectancy vs GDP per Capita",
    x = "GDP per Capita (log scale)",
    y = "Life Expectancy",
    color = "Continent"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```
